Data Download
=============
I use the following code to down the datasets


```{r,
## Download data file from web
temp <- tempfile() ## create temp file
download.file("https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip",temp) ## download zip file
unzip(temp) ## unzip file
rm(temp) ## remove temp file}

```

Scripts used
============
I used the following (2) scripts:

1. I used "run_analysis.R" to load the data into tables, clean it, and generate the final tidy data set

2. I wrote "read_tidy_data.R" for the coursera graders to use the read my tidy set back in
